job.title: Spark / Scala Data Engineer
job.description: <strong>Location: Sunnyvale, CA or Austin, TX Seattle WA <br><br></strong><strong>Fulltime <br><br></strong><strong>Candidate must be open to relocate post COVID<br></strong><ul><li>Experience in developing Big Data applications using java, Scala, python, Spark, Hive, Kafka, apache airflow</li><li>Strong analytical and interpersonal skills. Should be highly motivated and ability to learn quick</li><li>7-10 years with min 5 years experience &amp; In-depth understanding of data structures and algorithms</li><li>Designing and building dimensional data models to improve accessibility, efficiency, and quality of data</li><li>Database development experience with Relational or MPP/distributed systems such as Oracle/Teradata/Vertica/HANA/Hadoop/ </li><li>Programming experience in building high quality applications, data pipelines and analytics solutions. </li><li>Experience in working with frameworks, transpilers, code generators</li><li>Should be proficient in writing Advanced SQLs, Expertise in performance tuning of SQLs. </li></ul> Exposure to cloud methodologies and experience with AWS preferred
